item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok i added a code in the item2.java that looks like this

[code] public static int SkeletalWyvern[] = {
6139, 6141,526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526,
526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526, 526,
526, 526 };

public static int randomSkeletalWyvern() {
    return SkeletalWyvern[(int) (Math.random() * SkeletalWyvern.length)];
}[/code]

and then i use ::npc 3068 to spawn a SkeletalWyvern but he drops nothign how can i make him drop the items?
